title: Hans Rebele
text: Hans Rebele (born 26 January 1943) is a retired <a href="Germany">German</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He spent six seasons in the <a href="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> with <a href="TSV%201860%20M%C3%BCnchen">TSV 1860 München</a>. He also represented <a href="Germany%20national%20football%20team">Germany</a> in two friendlies.
